documentation.description: Provides statistics on operations happening in a data stream.

name.description: A comma-separated list of data stream names; use `_all` or empty string to perform the operation on all data streams

expand_wildcards.description: Whether to expand wildcard expression to concrete indices that are open, closed or both.

forbid_closed_indices.description: If set to false stats will also collected from closed indices if explicitly specified or if expand_wildcards expands to closed indices
